usage: arcyd start [-h] [--foreground] [--no-loop]

Start the arcyd instance for the current directory, if not already going.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help        show this help message and exit
  --foreground, -f  supply this argument to run arcyd interactively in the
                    foreground
  --no-loop         supply this argument to only process each repo once then
                    exit
